Game information:  


Jagged Alliance: Flashback - this is a game with a classic tactical
combat mode with stepwise transitions in real time at the end of it.
The game takes place on a group of islands of San Cristobal, in the
Caribbean. In the story, because of the coup on the island was founded
by the socialist regime - a change that puts on no American presence in
the area. The player will assemble a team of mercenaries to restore
democratic government in San Cristobal and get rid of the Soviet presence
in the islands. By any means.


RePack Features:  

Jagged Alliance: Flashback
